q1.q: Do I need an existing resume format?
q1.a: Yes, currently we support PDF uploads, but text input will be supported soon.

q2.a: Full refund is available within 7 days if credits are unused.

q3.a: Yes, you can freely edit the generated English resume in our web editor.
